p: Antibacterial activity was evaluated against S. aureus and methicillin-resistant S. aureus. Simplicildone K 430 exhibited antibacterial activity against Staphylococcus aureus and methicillin-resistant S. aureus with equal MIC values of 128 μg/mL. Vancomycin was used as a positive control for antibacterial activity and displayed equal MIC values of 0.5 μg/mL against both S. aureus and methicillin-resistant S. aureus [ 96].
